tool_description:
This API performs following functions -  
User Addition, User Retrieval,  Updation & Deletion
name: User Management
title: User Management

api_list.name: Get User based on ID
api_list.description: This end point returns user information based on provided user id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-management1.p.rapidapi.com/users/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://user-management1.p.rapidapi.com/users/{userid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Users
api_list.description: This endpoints returns all the stored users in the User Management System.
